meta.title: Custom Modules
meta.keyword: Your Second Keyword and so on

body.p: XMLNuke can work with Custom Modules. Custom Modules are SCRIPT PAGES (ASP, PHP, JAVA) written in the core engine's language. Custom modules can add more power to your site.
XMLNuke's engine has many built in functions to abstract Custom Modules creation. Classes to abstract XML pages, AnyDataSet (see Guestbook), Many Functions and more.
